title: Balance
description: DTO for basic balance infomation, not to be used directly.

first_signal_date.description: The date when the first signal was created/received

first_signal_time.description: The time of day when the first signal was created/received

last_signal_date.description: The date when the last signal was created/received

last_signal_time.description: The time of date when the first signal was created/received

member_count.description: Number of subscribers (seller) or number of providers the account is subscribed to (investor).

loss_count.description: The number of signals that were on loss

profit_count.description: The number of signals that turned profit on close time

open_count.description: The number of currently open signals

pl_all_time.description: The profit/loss ratio for all time

pl_month.description: The profit/loss ratio for the current month (since 1st)

pl_open.description: The profit/loss ratio for the currently open signals

pl_year.description: The profit/loss ratio for the current calendar year

tran_duration.description: The average duration in days of an open/close cycle
